Title: Requires the emergency response plan of an electric corporation to include plans for how the communication and coordination of efforts shall occur
Summary: Requires the emergency response plan of an electric corporation to include plans for how the communication and coordination of efforts shall occur.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring the emergency response plan of an electric corporation to include plans for how the communication and coordination of efforts shall occur
